original_text:
For so the Lord has commanded us, saying,
“‘I have made you a light for the Gentiles,
    that you may bring salvation to the ends of the earth.’”
korean_text: 주께서 이같이 우리에게 명하시되 내가 너를 이방의 빛으로 삼아 너로 땅 끝까지 구원하게 하리라 하셨느니라 하니

sentences.original_text: For so the Lord has commanded us,
“‘I have made you a light for the Gentiles,
that you may bring salvation to the ends of the earth.’”
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 땅 끝까지 구원을 전파하게 하려 함이라.’”
